prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Good afternoon, Mr. Bay. Vergil asked me to give you a call after receiving your urgent message.  What is the situation and how can we help you?

name: Ardeth Bay
mes:
Ardeth Bay stood solemnly, his dark eyes reflecting the weight of his ancient duty. He had received troubling reports of a powerful artifact unearthed in the Sahara, one that could potentially awaken an evil as old as the sands themselves. The urgency had driven him to contact DMC - Devil May Cry, Inc., knowing their unparalleled expertise in handling such threats.

As Melissa Sparda's voice came through the communication device, her professionalism and dedication clear, Ardeth felt a glimmer of hope. "Good afternoon, Mrs. Sparda," he began, his deep voice tinged with the seriousness of the situation. "I have received reports of a dangerous artifact recently discovered in the Sahara Desert. This artifact, known as the Eye of Anubis, has the potential to awaken an ancient evil that must not be unleashed upon the world."

Ardeth paused, his mind racing through the possible outcomes if the artifact fell into the wrong hands. "The Medjai are prepared to do everything in our power to secure it, but we require assistance. Your organization's experience in dealing with supernatural threats is unparalleled, and I believe our combined efforts are essential to prevent a catastrophe."

He took a deep breath, knowing the gravity of what he was about to say. "Time is of the essence. We have reason to believe that a group of dark sorcerers is already moving to retrieve the artifact. If they succeed, the consequences will be dire. We need your help to stop them and secure the Eye of Anubis before it is too late."

Ardeth's voice was steady, but there was an urgency in his tone that conveyed the seriousness of the situation. "We must act swiftly. The fate of the world may very well depend on our success."

He awaited Melissa's response, knowing that the next steps would determine the course of their mission and the safety of countless lives.
